feedback.comment: Excellent documentation header listing all indicators and test coverage areas
TestSMA class covers periods 5, 10, 20, 50, 200 with formula verification
TestRSI includes known values validation, overbought/oversold detection, bounds checking (0-100), and edge cases
TestMACD verifies histogram = MACD line - signal line, and tests bullish/bearish scenarios
TestEdgeCases comprehensively tests empty data, single price, extreme high/low prices, constant prices, and negative values for ALL indicators
TestTradingModeConfigs verifies SCALP/INTRADAY/SWING parameter configurations match expected values
TestAdaptiveIndicatorEngine tests mode detection, volatility calculation, and full adaptive indicator calculation

overall_comments: TASK-002 is exceptionally well implemented. The test file is comprehensive at 1245 lines covering all required indicators (SMA, EMA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, ATR, Stochastic, Williams %R, OBV, ROC, ADX, CCI, VWAP, Momentum). Each indicator has 3+ test cases. Edge cases are thoroughly covered including empty data, single values, extreme prices, and constant prices. Trading mode configurations (SCALP, INTRADAY, SWING) are validated. The adaptive indicator engine is also tested. This is production-ready test coverage.
test_output: Tests need to be run with: pytest api/tests/test_indicators.py -v
